name: Tank Combat!
description:
16 2-player maps + 1 3-Player map!

Tank combat is my third game in Clickteam Fusion 2.5, and in my opinion, my best game. Control a tank and defeat the others!

Classic mode:

Try to kill the other tank!

Capture The Flag:

Steal the flag, and bring it to your own base!

Islands:

Can you kill the other tank without beig able to get to them?

How to play:

2 Player:

    Blue: WASD, space to shoot. (Aim with mouse if Blue aim assist is off)

    Red: Arrow keys, shift to shoot.

3 Player:

    Blue: Same as before

    Red: Same as before

    Green: IJKL, Enter to shoot.

    All players point to nearest enemy. 3 Player possible on 1 keyboard, but 2 are recommended.

yes the win sounds are from csgo.
